page.title: 07HEALTH
page.content: Good health is important to us and we wash ,bathe or shower everyday to keep our bodies clean.All houses in Winthorpe have bathrooms and inside water closets.We clean our teeth to prevent decay and we wash our hair regularly. Children can be immunised against {diseases,}such as polio and whooping cough. Most get mumps ,measles and chickenpox and nearly everyone suffers from the common cold from time to time. These can be treated at home. When we are ill ,we visit {doctors}in Newark or Collingham. They prescribe medicines which are free to children through the Natianal Health Service. More seriously-ill people go into {hospital}in Newark or Nottingham for operations or special care. Ambulances,carrying life-saving equipment,are used for emergencies.
